content: I don't have access to real-time data. however, according to recent statistics, some of the most prevalent crimes in worcester include property crimes such as larceny, burglary, and motor vehicle theft, as well as violent crimes such as robbery and aggravated assault. these types of crimes are generally more prevalent in worcester than in some other cities in massachusetts, such as newton and brookline, but less prevalent than cities like springfield and boston, which usually have higher crime rates across various types of crimes. however, it's important to note that crime rates can vary depending on a variety of factors, such as location and demographic, so it is important to refer to up-to-date statistics for accurate comparisons.
